caption.title: Aeolian desertification land distribution in northern China generated from ArcGIS 9.3 software developed by ESRI (Environmental Systems Research Institute) and ERDAS IMAGINE 9.1 software developed by Leica Geosystems Geospatial Imaging, LLC.
caption.p: ArcGIS 9.3 software was downloaded from http://arcmap.software.informer.com/9.3/. ERDAS IMAGINE 9.1 software was downloaded from http://erdas-imagine.software.informer.com/9.1/. Yellow parts are the aeolian desertification land distribution regions.
